summary.span: Represents the collection of tables for the .

span.span: Represents the collection of tables for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含所有特定的物件。The contains all the objects for a particular . 若要存取的，使用屬性。To access the of a , use the property. 會使用方法時，這類， ，和管理集合中的項目。The uses methods such as , , and to manage the items in the collection. 使用方法，以判斷特定資料表 （索引或名稱所指定） 是否存在於集合。Use the method to determine whether a particular table (specified by either index or name) is in the collection. 若要從一個資料表瀏覽至另一個，使用或是屬性來存取它的集合物件。To navigate from one table to another, use the or property of the to access its collection of objects. 您也可以使用來瀏覽的父子式關聯性的屬性`DataTables`特別集合。You can also use the property to navigate through the parent/child relationships of the `DataTables` in a particular collection. ## Examples 在此範例中的第一個程序會擷取的並列印每個資料行，每個資料列，每個資料表中的值。The first procedure in this example retrieves the of a and prints the value of each column, in each row, of each table. 在第二個程序建立新兩個資料行，並將它加入。The second procedure creates a new with two columns, and adds it to the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有任一`null`或空字串 ("") 傳遞，提供預設名稱至新建立`DataTable`。If either `null` or an empty string ("") is passed in, a default name is given to the newly created `DataTable`. 這個名稱根據在其中新增資料表 （"Table1"、"Table2"，等等） 的順序。This name is based on the order in which the table was added ("Table1", "Table2", and so on). 如果資料表已成功新增至集合，就會發生事件。The event occurs if the table is successfully added to the collection. ## Examples 下列範例會將指定的名稱與。The following example adds a with the given name to the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的名稱物件使用屬性。You specify the name of the object by using the property. 如果您加入至具有集合方法，傳遞任何引數，資料表有一個預設名稱，根據在其中新增資料表 （"Table1"、"Table2"，等等） 的順序。If you add a to the collection with the method, passing no arguments, the table is given a default name, based on the order in which the table was added ("Table1", "Table2", and so on). 若要取得的索引，使用方法。To get the index of a , use the method. > [!NOTE] > 傳回`false`當兩個或多個資料表具有相同名稱但是命名空間。Returns `false` when two or more tables have the same name but different namespaces. 如果沒有任何名稱語意模糊比對一個資料表的資料表名稱時，呼叫就會失敗。The call does not succeed if there is any ambiguity when matching a table name to exactly one table. ## Examples 下列範例會測試是否具有名稱"供應商 」 資料表存在於。The following example tests whether a table with the name "Suppliers" exists in the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果名稱存在，並符合搜尋字串的情況下，它會傳回。If a name exists that matches the case of the search string, it is returned. 否則會執行不區分大小寫的搜尋，而且如果找到名稱符合此搜尋，它會傳回。Otherwise a case-insensitive search is performed, and if a name is found that matches this search, it is returned. 使用方法來判斷具有特定名稱或索引的資料表是否存在。Use the method to determine whether a table with a specific name or index exists. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取單一資料表，依名稱從。The following example retrieves a single table by name from the .
